Diamond::

"I have been talking with your subordinant DevilDuer. I wish to know 
how I may be of service to you. I was an assassin for the High 
Predacon Council back on Cybertron before I was brought into your 
base. I have killed may high ranking officals and wish to be active 
again. What orders would you have for me?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus nearly spins around as he hears Nemesis speak up behind him, 
> feeling like an idiot for a few seconds.
> 
> "Uh, yes of course," he says, looking at Nemesis, and then at 
Unitron.
> 
> "Do you know anything about defence construction and underwater 
> weapons?" Zardus asks the two bots, tapping a few buttons on his 
> wrist comp to search through the Iron Fist's stores, looking at the 
> supplies.
> 
> Zardus had started out as an engeneer/hacker on Hell Beast's team, 
> his first assignment being improvement of the defences (he could 
> still remember setting the defences against the ship when he ran 
away 
> from the Preds), and he could easily do what's neccessary by 
himself, 
> but more bots got jobs done quicker.
> 
> He recieves Diamond's transmission, replying to it, but not making 
> any sound externaly. "You can talk to me right now if you wish. I'm 
> outside the Alliance base, at the entrance to the Iron Fist."
>
